review: 3 weeks on it now almost back to normal few side affects mainly insomnia I fall asleep but don't stay asleep for as long as I should bit feeling a lot better compared to three weeks ago when I was hospitalized I do have to be on meds lifelong also I take PTU for thyroid

Excellent for this condition BP and heart rate and anxiety.  I was in emergency with this 6/11 BP 198/98 heart rate 140pm - not good. These propranolol tablet are working great on me heart rate back to normal BP too and no anxiety or shakes getting released from hospital tomorrow

I have been on this drug propranolol for a while on and off and it helps me tremendously. My thyroid sends my heart rate up and also my anxiety levels, which leads to feel really rough and not coping with simple daily tasks. Propranolol has helped me many times in the last 18yrs and it continues. I can function normally without the horrendous palpitations. No side effects at all.
Struggling with hyperthyroidism. Very fast heart rate and terrifying palpitations. Propranolol brought the rate down and stopped palpitations. I rely heavily on it. Great drug!
Inderal (propranolol):Inderal brought my heart rate down from 180 to 65 within 24 hours. I've been on it for 2 weeks, had no side effects, and feel much improved.
